document_data.name: Gift of Gab
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gift of gab''''' was an [[enchantment]] [[spell]] that altered the short-term memories of nearby people, making them forget that something was said.
document_data.Effects: The spell affected listeners within 5 feet (1.5 meters) of the caster. It erased their memories of everything they heard from the caster within the previous 6 seconds and replaced it with a new memory of the caster's choice.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]], [[Somatic component|somatic]], and [[royalty component]]s of 2 [[gp]]. The spell's verbal component became the listeners' new memory of what was said.
document_data.History: The spell was credited to the [[wizard]] [[Jim Darkmagic]], who originally called it ''I said what‚Åà''.
